name: Raging Blast:Idle AFK rpg game
description:
Recruit-Collect-Growth
Build your mighty crew with the hundreds of superheroes from the DB series. Embark on an adventure, challenge ever tougher enemies and rise to the top,and battle your way to the top
Strategy-Squad-Battle
Gear up your heroes, deploy them in your invincible squad, defeat all in the way. All squads have their own strengths and buffs. The key is to design the best strategy for different enemies.
Gifts-Missions-Rewards
Rewards are handed out at regular hours daily, and there're amazing gifts on special occasions. Even greater rewards available for completing missions. As long as you have a battle plan in place, rewards will accumulate even when you're offline; just claim them on your next login. Begin your adventure, anytime, anywhere.
